name: A Little Pirate
description:
In A Little Pirate players are on a quest to discover the inordinately wealthy Captain Hurago’s hidden treasure. They must solve the puzzles found across the islands of the Archipelago of VileBrill to unlock the treasure while trying to stay alive in the rough environment. 

Sound Designer:  DandyAndy - Gnom

Coder: Delta

Voice Actor: MeatLoverPizzaRex

Writers: WhitesRabbit - MeatLoverPizzaRex

Artist: TragicWonder
